animated.title: Finding Nemo
animated.plotSummary: This animated adventure follows the journey of Marlin, a clownfish, as he searches for his son Nemo who has been captured by a diver and taken to a dentist's office aquarium. Along the way, Marlin encounters Dory, a friendly but forgetful blue tang fish, and together they embark on a remarkable oceanic adventure filled with colorful characters, challenges, and heartwarming moments. 'Finding Nemo' is beloved by audiences of all ages for its stunning animation, engaging story, and messages of friendship, courage, and perseverance.

adventure.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
adventure.plotSummary: In the first installment of the epic fantasy trilogy, Frodo Baggins embarks on a perilous journey to destroy the One Ring and save Middle-earth from the dark lord Sauron. Alongside his loyal companions, Frodo faces numerous challenges and battles as they seek to fulfill their quest.

adventure.title: Jurassic World: Dominion
adventure.plotSummary: Set four years after the events of Jurassic World: Fallen Kingdom, Dominion continues the story of dinosaurs unleashed into the world. As humanity grapples with the consequences of their existence, Owen Grady and Claire Dearing return to Isla Nublar to rescue dinosaurs from an impending volcanic eruption, only to uncover a conspiracy that threatens the future of life on Earth.

comedy.title: Finding Nemo
comedy.plotSummary: This animated adventure follows the journey of Marlin, a clownfish, as he searches for his son Nemo who has been captured by a diver and taken to a dentist's office aquarium. Along the way, Marlin encounters Dory, a friendly but forgetful blue tang fish, and together they embark on a remarkable oceanic adventure filled with colorful characters, challenges, and heartwarming moments. 'Finding Nemo' is beloved by audiences of all ages for its stunning animation, engaging story, and messages of friendship, courage, and perseverance.

romance.title: The Notebook
romance.plotSummary: In this romantic drama, Noah Calhoun and Allie Hamilton fall deeply in love one summer in the 1940s, but are soon separated by societal pressures and World War II. Despite the obstacles, their love endures, as they reconnect years later and reflect on the enduring power of true love.

action.title: The Batman
action.plotSummary: In this gritty reboot, Bruce Wayne, the vigilante known as Batman, investigates a series of gruesome murders in Gotham City, leading him to encounter a mysterious criminal known as The Riddler. As Batman delves deeper into the conspiracy, he confronts his own inner demons and forms unlikely alliances to save the city from chaos.

action.title: Top Gun: Maverick
action.plotSummary: In this sequel to the 1986 classic, Maverick returns to train a new generation of pilots, including Bradley 'Rooster' Bradshaw, the son of Maverick's late friend and Radar Intercept Officer, Nick 'Goose' Bradshaw. As Maverick confronts his past and navigates the challenges of the modern military, he must also inspire his trainees and earn their respect as a legendary fighter pilot.

action.title: Avatar 2
action.plotSummary: Details about the plot of Avatar 2 are not yet officially released.
